#Server for Testing

= Introduction =

To support this project, MIT has made available a server to assist in testing the service-bus.  The server's URL is `oki-dev.mit.edu`  It is not dedicated to the osid-service-bus, but is shared with other projects.  

= Details =
* Request access to this server by emailing Peter Wilkins (pwilkins <at> mit <dot> edu)
* The server is a VM running 64-bit Redhat Linux.
